mainfeatures: 1/3.2" CMOS 5.0 Mega pixels Sensor 16.0 Mega pixels/5.0 Mega pixels Built-in 128MB Flash Memory, SDHC Compatible (Up to SDHC 32GB Class6) 5x Digital zoom, 2x advanced zoom TV out format: NTSC / PAL / HDMI Li-ion Battery NP120
specifications: Imaging sensor: 1/3.2" CMOS 5.0 Mega pixels Sensor Active pixels: 16.0 Mega pixels/5.0 Mega pixels Built-in 128MB Flash Memory (Available memory space for image storage is approximately 72MB) SD Card: SDHC Compatible (Up to SDHC 32GB Class6) Color effects: Color/B&W/Sepia Lens: F3.2, f=5.1mm Focus range: Normal: 1.5m ~ infinity, Macro: 20cm ~ 21cm Still image format: JPEG (EXIF 2.2), DCF, DPOF Image resolution: 1M, 2M, 5M, 7M, 16M (Firmware Interpolation) Movie Clip format: H.264 (AVI) Resolution: QVGA, WVGA, HD (1280 x 720 / 30 fps) Zoom: 5X Digital zoom, 2X zdvanced zoom Still Image Playback: Digital Zoom max 16x TFT monitor:3.0" TFT (960 x 240 pixels) LED light effective range: LED light mode: On/Night Mode /Off White balance: Auto / Sunny / Cloudy / Tungsten / Fluorescent EV compensation: -2.0 EV ~  2.0 EV Self-timer: Off / 2 seconds / 10 seconds PC interface: USB 2.0 (High Speed) TV out format: NTSC / PAL / HDMI Shutter speed: Electronic shutter, 1/8 ~ 1/2000 second Auto power off: Off / 1 minute / 5 minutes Power supply: Li-ion Battery NP120 Dimensions: 120 x 62 x 48mm Weight: Approx 231±5g (without battery)
label2: Built-in 128MB Flash Memory (Available memory space for image storage is approximately 72MB)
packagecontents: 1 x Digital camcorder HD-160Z 1 x Li-ion battery 1 x HDMI cable 1 x USB cable 1 x AV cable 1 x CD-Rom 1 x Camera pouch 1 x User manual
